Program Information

Anna Daan ♦ Preeti Bhoj Sponsorship ♦ Tulsi & Flower Sponsorship ♦ Fees & Non-Fees Inquiries ♦ Program Names & Schedule ♦ GEOKC Gurus Names and Positions They Serve ♦ Programs Registration Forms

Flower Sponsorship Opportunities

Tulsi & Flower Sponsorship Form 

Fees & Non-Fees Inquiries

Programs with Fees

Spiritual Discourse $50.00

Bhakti Sadhana:
Services of Yoga Center $65.00

Satsang Services:
Preeti Bhoj Sponsorship Form

Ashram Spiritual Guidance:
Seekers Spiritual Programs (With Fee)
Seekers Spiritual Programs Form (PDF)

Seekers Visitation Information:
Accommodation Fees (including meal):
For one week is $450.00
For two Weeks is $ 750.00

Radha-Krishna Raas Lila Temple Services (with Fee)
Radha-Krishna Raas Lila Temple Services Form (PDF)
Shop for Lord Krishna

Programs without Fees

Ten Avatars of Lord Vishnu
GEOKC Shri Krishna Murari Bhakti Moment
Services of Padasevana and Dasya
GEOKC Devotional Music:
GEOKC Traditional Bhajans
GEOKC Kirtan Heritage

Program Names & Schedule

Weekly Schedule

GEOKC Regular Hours:
Weekdays: 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM
Weekends & Holidays: 9:30 AM to 1:30 PM and 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM

GEOKC Program Hours:

  1. Spiritual Discourse Schedule:
    Every Monday
    6:30 to 8:30pm
    $50.00
  2. Bhakti Sadhana:
    Services of Yoga Center Schedule:
    Every Tuesday
    6 pm to 8pm
    $65.00
    GEOKC Devotional Music:
    GEOKC Traditional Bhajans and
    GEOKC Kirtan Heritage Schedule:
    Regular Hours:
    Weekdays (Monday – Friday)
    Time: 5:30 p.m. to 8:30 p.m.
    Weekends (Saturday and Sunday)
    Time: 9:30 a.m. to 1:30 p.m. and 5:30 p.m. to 8:30 p.m.
    Special Occasions Hours:
    Weekdays (Monday – Friday)
    Time: 5:30 p.m. to 8:30 p.m.
    Weekends (Saturday and Sunday)
    Time: 9:30 a.m. to 1:30 p.m. and 5:30 p.m. to 8:30 p.m.
    Services of Padasevana and Dasya Schedule:
    Every Saturday 5:30 pm to 8:30pm
    Path of Popularization and Expansion:

• GEOKC Shri Krishna Murari Bhakti Moment Schedule: Each week after the Sunday afternoon satsang it will start:Shri Krishna Murari Kirtan Schedule (PDF)
• GEOKC Shrimad Bhagavad-Gita Satsang Group Schedule:
Regular Hours:
365 Days of the Year or 7 Days a Week Schedule:
Bhagavad Gita Recitation in Sanskrit:
Start:
First Friday of the First Month
End:
Last Friday of the Last Month
Schedule for All Participants:
Each Friday – 5:30 pm – 8:30 pm: Spiritual discourse and discussion
Offering, Prayer for Peace, Gita Aarti, and
Satvic Nourishment

  1. Satsang Services Schedule:
    Weekdays: 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM
    Weekends & Holidays: 9:30 AM to 1:30 PM and 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM
  2. Ten Avatars of Lord Vishnu Schedule:
    Weekdays: 5:30pm to8:30pm
    Weekend & Holidays:
    5:30pm to8:30pm
  3. Ashram Spiritual Guidance Schedule (Wednesday band Thursday are available):
    Weekdays: 5:30 to 8:30pm
    Weekend & Holidays:
    9:30am to 1:30pm
  4. Shop for Lord Krishna (Online Shop)

GEOKC Gurus Names & Positions They Serve

GEOKC Main Head Guru (Pujya Guruji)

Program Areas to Serve:

Satsang Services
GEOKC Shrimad Bhagavad-Gita Satsang Group

Initiation
GEOKC Head Gurus #1,#2, #3, #4, #5, #6, #7 organized the following programs under the guidance of GEOKC Main Head Guru (Pujya Guruji):

Bhakti Sadhana:
Services of yoga Center (Initiation only done by Pujya Guruji)
Ashram Spiritual Guidance
GEOKC Shri Krishna Murari Bhakti Moment
GEOKC Traditional Bhajans
GEOKC Kirtan Heritage
Spiritual Discourses
Services of Padasevana
Services of Dasya
Program of Ten Avatars of Lord Vishnu
Shop for Lord Krishna

GEOKC Head Gurus Specials:

GEOKC Head Gurus Specials includes temple specific responsibilities:

Radha-krishna Temple Priests
For more information on these roles, please see the Gurus and Staff page on the website.

GEOKC Other Gurus & Staff

Program Areas to Serve:

HR Spiritual Staff Opportunities
Facility Management Opportunities
